alert.note: Alert for Adams; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 18 at 10:55PM CDT until September 18 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pike County in west central Illinois... Southwestern Adams County in west central Illinois... North central Ralls County in northeastern Missouri... Eastern Marion County in northeastern Missouri... Southern Lewis County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1054 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Maywood, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Palmyra around 1105 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hannibal, Payson and Fall Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 172 between exits 2 and 10. Interstate 72 near exit 4. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Illinois...and northeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Illinois...and northeastern Missouri.
